topic.title: Little Red Riding Hood
topic.shortdesc: Red riding hood sets out to make a basket of food for her grandmother. Then sets off to her grandmothers house.

section.title: Introduction
section.p: Once upon a time there was a little girl named Red. She lived with her mother right outside of the woods. This little girl was loved by everyone but her grandmother loved her most of all.

section.title: Chapter 1: Grandma is Sick
section.p: "Come little Red, your Grandmother has fallen sick. Could you send over some fresh bread and some medicine for her? I am sure just seeing you will make her feel better." Little Red's mother says.
"Come little Red, your Grandmother has fallen sick. Could you send over some fresh bread and some wine for her? I am sure just seeing you will make her feel better." Little Red's mother says.
"Of course mother." Red would do anything to help her mother and Grandmother because she loved them so dearly.
Little Red and her mother decided to make a fresh bread in the oven. Once it was fully ready, they put all the medicine and bread in a basket, covering it with a napkin to keep it warm.
Little Red and her mother decided to make a fresh sourdough in the oven. Once it was fully ready, they put the wine and bread in a basket, covering it with a napkin to keep it warm.
